description:
cmd/8g: factor out prog information

Like CL 12637051, but for 8g instead of 6g.
Fix a few minor 6g errors too.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3c7cac86a284 ***

cmd/8g: factor out prog information

Like CL 12637051, but for 8g instead of 6g.
Fix a few minor 6g errors too.

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12778043

Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On 2013/08/12 17:05:43, rsc wrote:
> *** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=3c7cac86a284 ***
> 
> cmd/8g: factor out prog information
> 
> Like CL 12637051, but for 8g instead of 6g.
> Fix a few minor 6g errors too.
> 
> R=ken2
> CC=golang-dev
> https://codereview.appspot.com/12778043

lgtm

would it be better to have a common
opcode list for 8 and 6? that way, setprog
would be the same. some of the other
subroutines could also be common.

On Mon, Aug 12, 2013 at 4:04 PM, <ken@google.com> wrote:

> would it be better to have a common
> opcode list for 8 and 6? that way, setprog
> would be the same. some of the other
> subroutines could also be common.
>

i agree. there's some toolchain cleanup i'd like to try in the winter for
go 1.3 and it could include this.

subject: code review 12778043: cmd/8g: factor out prog information
